name: Pyramid S4C
description:
Welcome to Pyramid.

Deep within its walls lurk a series of ancient Egyptian puzzles, traps and challenges, including the ominous Golden Pharaoh’s tomb. This app supports the ‘Pyramid’ game-show on S4C and allows you to play along with the television contestants by selecting the TV Sync mode, or you can aim for high scores on varied difficulties with the Play Levels mode. Come and venture into the tunnels and tombs of Pyramid and put your skills to the test.

App features:
- 10 unique challenges
- 3 levels of difficulty
- Completion ratings and high scores
- 3D environments
- Play in real-time with on air games

-----

Croeso i Pyramid.

Mentra i fyd o siambrau llawn cysgodion, sgarabau cyflym a hieroglyffau lliwgar i wynebu amryw o bosau a sialensau o’r Hen Aifft. Mae ‘na 10 gêm gwahanol – rhai côf, sgil, datrys problemau, ymateb cyflym a rhifau. Cer am sgôriau uchel wrth glicio’r eicon ‘CHWARAE’ neu dewisa’r eicon ‘TELEDU’ i chwarae gyda’r cystadleuwyr ar raglen Pyramid pan fo’n fyw ar S4C.

Yr app:

- 10 gêm
- 3 lefel i bob gêm
- Cofnod sgoriau uchel

- Chwarae r’un pryd â’r rhaglen deledu
